error_events.description: Safety issue detected: Monitoring system failure. The system is not providing a view of the robot, creating a significant operational risk as any real-time issues like spills, crashes, or protocol errors would go undetected.
error_events.actual_state: Monitoring system failure. The system is not providing a view of the robot, creating a significant operational risk as any real-time issues like spills, crashes, or protocol errors would go undetected.
